name: To my dearest family
textInChatBox: Merry Christmas. Wish you all the best! 🫶
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishText: I wish all of you the very best and hope this time brings us closer, enveloped in love, laughter, and cherished moments together. 🫶
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
